text: Festus Katuna Mbandeka was appointed Namibia's attorney general in Hage Geingob's second term Cabinet of Namibia on March 21, 2020. Prior to his government position, he was the CEO of Communications Regulatory Authority of Namibia from September 2015 to March 2020. Mbandeka is a legal practitioner and was admitted to the profession by the High Court of Namibia in 1997. In the past, he worked for the Office of the Attorney General, sat on the board of directors of the Namibia Diamond Trading Company, and was the legal advisor for Namibia's tech-com giant Mobile Telecommunication Company (MTC). ==References== Category:Living people Category:Namibian lawyers Category:Attorneys-General of Namibia Category:University of Natal alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Festus Mbandeka
